document_data.name: Lorn Thorvim
document_data.mainbody: '''Lorn Thorvim''' was a victim to [[the Simbul]]'s temper in {{yearlink|1372}}.
document_data.History: By [[Phaeldara]]'s reckoning, the [[Simbul]] brained Lorn with a platter in the morning on the day she latter scoured [[Avernus]] looking for [[Elminster Aumar]].
